title: Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1930
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: SCALE 1"=1'0"; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation for low, rectangular sideboard. Top and left side in dark, reflective material (Bakelite ?); body in lighter wood with dark pulls on drawers. Four small stacked drawers at left with circular pulls at center of each drawer. At right near top are two long, narrow stacked drawers; two large square cabinets below; cabinets and drawers at right have same dark, rectangular and long pulls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-125.
